name: Hey, Can We Talk?
description:
Hey, Can We Talk? is a short puzzle game about catching phone reception in a forest with strange, iterative properties. As the conversation develops, you wonder if you'll ever escape (you won't, you deserve it).

  • Arrow Keys or WASD to move
  • Space to progress dialogue
  • V to toggle VHS filter
  • F to toggle fullscreen
  • Esc for credits

One of my New Year's resolutions is to develop one game for each month. Hey, Can We Talk? is the first in this series. If you enjoy the January entry, feel free to stick around for the journey! If you're interested in the full process, be sure to check out the development logs. Thanks :)
